name: Brain Hole Girls
description:
This is a puzzle and leisure game, which can train your logical thinking ability and quickly turn your brain to answer our questions! When you encounter difficulties, you can use the reward key to open the prompt window to help you find the answer. Of course, after the exercise, there will be exquisite CG as a reward, so that you can return from the tense state to the relaxed moment.

You will get:

*Hundreds of puzzle questions

*Dozens of exquisite CG
